byline.contributor: Victor Mather and Andrew Das contributed reporting.

abstract: United States Soccer Federation fires US men's national soccer team coach Jurgen Klinsmann, following team's uneven play during two recent losses in World Cup qualifying matches; former national team coach and current Los Angeles Galaxy coach Bruce Arena is expected to replace Klinsmann.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Mounting criticism and recent defeats in World Cup qualifying, including a 4-0 thrashing at Costa Rica last week, led U.S. Soccer to change course.
snippet: Mounting criticism and recent defeats in World Cup qualifying, including a 4-0 thrashing at Costa Rica last week, led U.S. Soccer to change course....

headline.main: Jurgen Klinsmann Fired as U.S. Soccer Coach
